item.description:
Join members of the Pub Crawlers of Boston and Fun With Alcohol on a pub crawl in Central Square.  Since there will be non-Red Sox Natives members in attendance, I suggest that we show our Red Sox pride and wear some Red Sox gear (especially since there may be Yankee fans in attendance)!

The Sox play this night home versus the Cubs.  Game time at 7:10 p.m. so perhaps we can catch the game during the last few stops and beyond.

Here is the schedule for the 2nd Annual Central Square Pub Crawl:

2:00 p.m. - Miracle of Science
2:45 p.m. - Phoenix Landing
3:30 p.m. - Tavern in the Square
4:15 p.m. - Plough & Stars
5:00 p.m. - People's Republik
5:45 p.m. - Cantab Lounge
6:30 p.m. - The Field
7:15 p.m. - Middle East
8:00 p.m. - The Asgard

I have already called each of the pubs so that they know we are coming - each one is looking forward to our appearance.

Feel free to come and go as you please.  Although I will be holding a tight schedule, there is no rush to move from stop to stop so feel free to take your time at each pub.

There is no cost to attend, just be responsible for your own tab and be sure to tip your bartenders!

Happy crawling!
item.how_to_find_us: I will pass out my cell phone number that Friday before the crawl to anyone who RSVP's "YES" so that you can find us along the way.
item.why: It was brought to my attention that this will actually be the 2nd pub crawl in Central Square that another meetup that I am part of has done in as many years. Let's keep this new tradition going strong!
item.name: Central Square Pub Crawl (2nd Annual)
